name: traefik
description: Traefik is an open-source Edge Router that makes publishing your services a fun and easy experience.

name: walabag
description: Wallabag allows you to not miss any content anymore. Click, save and read it when you can. It extracts content so that you can read it when you have time.

name: nextcloud
description: Nextcloud is a suite of client-server software for creating and using file hosting services.

name: codimd
description: CodiMD lets you collaborate in real-time with markdown.
